key_phrases: Austin’s creative identity was built by grassroots organizations and cultural leaders
Focusing on equity and long-term support
Support means listening, investing, and sustaining—not replacing
barriers_identified: insufficient focus on equity and sustainability
solutions_proposed: Centering grassroots organizations and leaders in decision-making
Providing capacity-building tools in addition to funding
Focusing on equity and long-term support
Listening, investing, and sustaining rather than replacing
